name: License to Kill
effects: Increase physical and magic damage against Demons by 50%
Increase physical and magic damage against Machinas by 50%
Increase physical and magic damage against Fairies by 50%
Increase physical and magic damage against Reapers by 50%

name: License to Kill
殺戮之光
죽음의 빛
Permis de tuer
Lizenz zum Töten
Licencia para matar
desc_short: Boost physical and magic damage against demon, machina, fairy, and reaper monsters
物理、魔法攻擊時提高對惡魔機械精靈死靈系魔物的傷害
물리, 마법공격 시 악마, 기계, 정령, 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Augmente les dégâts physiques et magiques contre les dragons, les machines, les esprits, et les morts-vivants
Erhöht physischen und magischen Schaden gegen Dämonen, Maschinen, Feen und Untote.
Aumenta daño físico y mágico contra demonios, máquinas, espíritus y muertos vivientes
desc_long: Boosts physical and magic damage against demon, machina, fairy, and reaper monsters.
物理、魔法攻擊時提高對惡魔機械精靈死靈系魔物的傷害。
물리, 마법공격 시 악마, 기계, 정령, 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente les dégâts physiques et magiques contre les dragons, les machines, les esprits, et les morts-vivants
Erhöht physischen und magischen Schaden gegen Dämonen, Maschinen, Feen und Untote.
Aumenta el daño físico y mágico contra demonios, máquinas, espíritus y muertos vivientes.
